title: Shit game.
body: Well I've been playing this game since 2010. And I enjoyed it up untill about Mid S7. The riot team is trash which made this game complete garabge. I'll be uninstalling this shitty ass garabge. And leaving this shit company to fail in about a year when noone plays this game and it dies because riot doesn't know what they are doing at all. So Good luck going under.
